description: A two-piece hood. Kangaroo pocket. Ribbed cuffs and hem. The Logo Play Hoodie puts a new spin on our iconic logo and is an easy choice for instant, reliable warmth on blustery days. The use of recycled materials in our manufacturing process creates slight variations in fabric color and texture, meaning that every garment is not just more sustainable, but completely unique.
name: The North Face Logo Play Hoodie - Mens
